  • Constructor Details

    • GameSceneController

      public GameSceneController(ClientGUIState state, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Constructs a new GameSceneController with the specified client state and stage.
      Parameters:
      state - the current state of the client GUI, cast to GameGUIState.
      stage - the primary stage for this controller.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the game scene controller. This method is automatically called after the FXML file has been loaded. It sets up the game environment, including initializing components, setting event handlers, loading images, configuring the chat box, and setting up the scoreboard.

    • showStage

      public void showStage()
      Displays the game stage.

    • executeAnimations

      public void executeAnimations(HashMap<String,Integer> initScore, HashMap<String,Integer> finalScore)
      Executes score animations for all players.
      Parameters:
      initScore - a HashMap containing the initial scores of the players
      finalScore - a HashMap containing the final scores of the players

    • updateGame

      public void updateGame(String currentPlayerTurn, ArrayList<Integer> playerScores, ArrayList<PlayableCard> normalDeck, ArrayList<PlayableCard> goldenDeck) throws InterruptedException
      Updates the game state and user interface based on the current player's turn, player scores, and deck states.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerTurn - the username of the player whose turn it is
      playerScores - a list of player scores
      normalDeck - a list of normal deck cards
      goldenDeck - a list of golden deck cards
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during animations

    • updateGame

      public void updateGame(ArrayList<Integer> playerScores) throws InterruptedException
      Updates the game state and user interface based on the provided player scores.
      Parameters:
      playerScores - a list of player scores
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during animations

    • disableAllCardInputs

      public void disableAllCardInputs(Boolean bool)
      Enables or disables all card inputs based on the provided boolean value.
      Parameters:
      bool - a boolean value indicating whether to disable (true) or enable (false) all card inputs

    • updateDeck

      public void updateDeck()
      Updates the visual representation of the normal and golden decks.

    • updateHand

      public void updateHand()
      Updates the visual representation of the player's hand. The method ensures that the hand cards' visual states are consistent with the player's current hand.

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore()
      Updates the displayed scores for all players currently in the game.

    • chooseHandCard

      public void chooseHandCard(int n)
      Allows the player to choose a card from their hand to play.
      Parameters:
      n - the index of the card in the player's hand to be chosen and played

    • chooseDeckCard

      public void chooseDeckCard(int n, boolean deckType)
      Allows the player to choose a card from a specified deck and add it to their hand.
      Parameters:
      n - the index of the card to draw from the deck
      deckType - true if selecting from the golden deck, false if selecting from the normal deck

    • getState

      public GameGUIState getState()

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(String playerDisconnected)
      Removes a player from the game when they disconnect.
      Parameters:
      playerDisconnected - the username of the player who disconnected

    • updateSymbolsCounter

      public void updateSymbolsCounter()

    • setFinalTurn

      public void setFinalTurn()
